title: FAKE Alert: Chinese Prez Xi Jinping’s picture, in connection with COVID-19, is morphed | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
Amid the Coronavirus outbreak, a picture is doing the rounds on social media, which features a man who appears similar to Chinese President Xi Jinping.

ALSO READ: No, actor Naseeruddin Shah is NOT hospitalised; Here’s the Fact Check

NewsMobile fact-checked the above picture and found it to be FAKE.

On putting the picture through Reverse Image Search, we found the original picture.

It is seen that the original picture features former Chief Minister of Bihar, Lalu Prasad Yadav. He can be seen holding something that looks like a black grape, but in the morphed picture it has been replaced by a graphical image of the Coronavirus.

It is clear in the FAKE vs REAL collage that Jinping’s face was superimposed on Lalu’s face.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
